content.text:
# Draft:Martin Edwards

}}
| current_member_of = CORTIS
}}
Martin Edwards Park (Songpa-gu, Seoul, South Korea, 20 March 2008) is a Korean-Canadian singer, songwriter, rapper and producer. He is the leader of the K-pop boy group CORTIS, which debuted in 18 August 2025 under HYBE's BigHit Music. He is known for his extensive production work, including contributions to songs by artists like ILLIT, TOMORROW X TOGETHER, LE SSERAFIM and ENHYPEN.
